column4: anyone have problems with ZendStudio 5.5.1 after last update? It hogs 100% of cpu, the second not updated pc works fine.
zend studio isn't an ubuntu package is it
you may want to contact zend about that
ubuntu's updates break it :) so it's ubuntu's problem. it hink last java updates
please stop using caps lock and talking in captials
what are you trying to install
thunderbird is already in the ubuntu repos
you just install it from the package manager, you don't need to compile it
what version of ubuntu are you using ?
is there are reason you don't want to use thunderbird 3 ?
can't use lightning with it and i need it for clendar events
lightnining is supported in 3 I believe
I advise you not to follow Cheapshot's advice
unless you %100 know what is in that PPA and what it will pull into your system, blindly adding PPA's is not a wise solution
lightining works on thuderbird 3.1 which is in natty, so you should have zero issues with it
